item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hour series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in Providence.

This week's location is: Celtic Lounge at Finnegan's Wake.

If you've been to Finnegan's Wake in the past, you'll be pleasantly surprised when you walk into Celtic Lounge. This bar & restaurant is under new management and has been completely renovated. The signs outside still say Finnegan's Wake, but as soon as you walk through the door you'll be transported to the new Celtic Lounge.

They've agreed to put some free appetizers out for us, but there is no telling how long they'll last, so get there early!

Hope to see you there! Bring a friend!

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours.
Ever.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be the group standing near the bar and the free appetizers.
item.name: Monday Night Meetup - Celtic Lounge (Finnegan's Wake)
